deng3 xiao4 bai3 wan4 dun1 dang1 liang4

sentences.english: Vedanta hopes the refinery will produce at least one million tonnes of alumina a year.
sentences.chinese: 萬達塔希望鍊鋁廠一年至少能生產一百萬噸鋁。

sentences.english: The total output of pears in the village has reached one million tons.
sentences.chinese: 該鄉的黃梨總產量高達一百萬噸。

sentences.english: Plastic packaging accounts for an estimated 5m tonnes of crude oil each year.
sentences.chinese: 另外，製造塑料包裝每年需耗費大約5百萬噸的原油。

sentences.english: The group has set a target of one million tons of milled rice exported by 2015.
sentences.chinese: 該組織已經設定了2015年出口百萬噸精米的目標。

sentences.english: I know that nuclear bombs are measured in terms of megatons.
sentences.chinese: 我知道原子彈以百萬噸級計。
